channel.title: Need help with these errors!
channel.description:
im häving problems with the errors below.Server runs just finne but no spawns or shops. and it seems that it cant load these files.Now i know that linux is case sensitive but i could not find the place where it loads these files to fix it.Its like this:I rename the folder so it finds the 2 files and then i wont find another 2 files in data folder.and when i rename it back it will not find the first 2 files but finds the rest like wtf? So if anyone can help me with this id be really grateful! oh and my run.sh looks like this : java -classpath bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar: server.Server & If you need any more details just reply below and ill add em
[img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2hgh7iu.png[/img]

item.title: Need help with these errors!
item.dc:creator: @5oulreaper 5oulreaper
item.description:
@5oulreaper wrote:

Pure_:

ItemHandler#loadItemPrices and WalkingHandler#initialize.

OMG i cant thank you enough man.Seriously thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with these errors!
item.dc:creator: @5oulreaper 5oulreaper
item.description:
@5oulreaper wrote:

N_A:

Check the casing of the folder names and that there is actually a prices.txt, npc/spawn-config.cfg in those designated directories.

you have Skype? ill show you more details there
and yeah im sure that the files exists.Btw you have any idea which file loads em?

Read full topic

@Null_Amount wrote:
